# Figures

<!-- Main run figures -->
```{r, results = 'asis'}
add_figure(
filein = file.path(reb[[1]]$loc, "rebuilding_probability.png"), 
caption = "Probability of rebuilding by year for alternative rebuilding strategies",
label = 'prob-fig')
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
add_figure(
filein = file.path(reb[[1]]$loc, "rebuilding_acl.png"), 
caption = "Catches (mt) by year for alternative rebuilding strategies",
label = 'acl-fig')
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
add_figure(
filein = file.path(reb[[1]]$loc, "rebuilding_relative_sb.png"), 
caption = "Spawning output relative to the management target of 40 percent of unfished spawning output by year for alternative rebuilding strategies",
label = 'rel-ssb-fig')
```

```{r, results = 'asis'}
add_figure(
filein = file.path(reb[[1]]$loc, "rebuilding_ssb.png"), 
caption = "Spawning output by year for alternative rebuilding strategies",
label = 'rel-ssb-fig')
```
